content.legion: Chance for attack to deal increased %Damage
classType: Party Buff - Crit Rate + Crit Damage

pros: Unique mechanic of mounting a Jaguar that you can ride and attack on
Lots of %Damage Reduction passives and %Max HP buffs
Has summons that attack for you and 5th Job makes you a cat lady
Has very good party buffs with Call of the Wild and Sharp Eyes
Has a bind with Jaguar Soul
cons: Micromanagement with controlling Jaguar when unmounted
Occasionally has lots of buttons to press and manage

baseStats: Excludes attack specfic bonuses, Hyper Skill passives, Flurry buff, and buffs with long cooldowns
Attack: [ +10%] [ +20%]
Crit Rate: [ +25%] [ +20%] [ +20%] [ up to +18%]
Crit Damage: [ +15%] [ up to +12%] [ +8% while unmounted]
Final Damage: [ +10%] [ +20%]
Knockback Resistance: [ +50%] [ +50%] [ +50% while mounted]
Abnormal Status Resistance: [ 15] [ 30 while unmounted]

buffInfo.active: (Mount), , ,
buffInfo.summons: (8s cd),(30s cd), (149 - 120s cd)
buffInfo.buffCd: (120s cd), (120s cd)
buffInfo.buffFifth: (180s cd), (120s cd)

details: Can be stacked up to 4 times, once for each unique Resistance character (Except Demons and Xenon) to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Resistance' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until Lv. 10 and talk to Belle in the Secret Plaza when prompt with choosing a class

build: -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Feline Berserk - Reinforce
  • Summon Jaguar - Enhance, Reinforce and Cooldown Cutter
  • Wild Arrow Blast - Reinforce

primary.name: Crystal Throw
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage: 40
primary.desc: Throws a rock that deals fixed damage

primary.name: Infiltrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Hide for 30 sec, Movement Speed: +15
primary.desc: Turn invisible preventing touch damage

primary.name: Potion Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Recovery Rate: +115%

primary.name: Secret Assembly
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, you move to the Resistance Secret Plaza\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Capture
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, can capture up to 5 types of monsters\nCooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Allows you to capture a monster which you can then summon to fight for you
details: Monsters can be captured after their HP falls below 90%
This skill is used to capture Jaguars that can be used as mounts

primary.name: Call of the Hunter
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, summons a monster for 60 sec\nThe monster attacks with 200% + 1% per monster level damage every 2 sec\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Allows you to randomly summon a monster you've captured (aside from a Jaguar)

primary.name: Double Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22, Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 2
primary.desc: Fires two arrows but only hits one enemy

primary.name: Double Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost 22, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 80%, Number of Piercing Attacks: 2, Number of Bullets: 2
primary.desc: Fires two arrows and Jaguar artillery that pierces and hit multiple enemies but has reduced damage and range

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details:
Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
  • While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump

primary.name: Graviboots
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row
Shares the same Skill Points (SP) and Key Slot with Double Jump

primary.name: Jaguar Rider
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Speed While Riding: 40, Knockback Resistance: +50%\nCooldown: 1 sec
primary.desc: Mount onto your Jaguar for mounted attacks
details: Increases your Movement Speed, %Knockback Resistance while riding

primary.name: Summon Jaguar
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage of Summoned Jaguar: 140% + 1% per character level. Debuff Chance: 15%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 15 sec
Another Bite: [Final Attack Type Skill] Crossbow-Type Skills - Damage against Debuffed Enemies: 60% per stack + 1% for every 3 player levels.
Critical Damage of Summoned Jaguar: +8%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30.
Cooldown: 1 sec.
primary.desc: Summons your Jaguar to fight with you
details: [Final Attack Debuff]: When Jaguar attacks, there is a chance to apply a stacking debuff called 'Another Bite' that causes your Crossbow skills to deal an extra attack
If your Jaguar is already summoned, you can use this skill again to mount onto it
When Jaguar is summoned you will gain increased %Crit Damage and Abnormal Status Resistance
While summoned, pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together fixes Jaguar in place and attacks nearby enemies
Prioritizes bosses with highest HP within range first

primary.name: Swipe
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 200% + 1% per character level, Number of Attacks: 4.
Debuff Chance when attacking an enemy without Another Bite Debuff: 100%, Bonus Another Bite Debuff Chance: 30%.
Recover 7% of Max HP when attacking.
Cooldown: 5 sec
primary.desc: Command your Jaguar to swipe at enemies in front of you and applying the debuff 'Another Bite'
details: [Note]: Jaguar skills can only be used while unmounted
If Swipe lands, you will heal some %Max HP
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Wild Lure
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Provoked: 10, Provocation Duration: 10 sec. Duration is cut in half against bosses.\nCooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: Provokes enemies to attack your Jaguar
details: Duration is halved against bosses

primary.name: Resistance Auto Crank
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20, Crossbow Skill Attack Range: +50, Jump: +20, Speed: +40

primary.name: Nature's Wrath
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +25%

primary.name: Jaguar Management
primary.shortDesc: Manage captured Jaguars using the mouse.
primary.desc: Opens a UI that shows all your captured Jaguars
details: Special Jaguars captured give bonus stats
Snow White and Onyx Jaguar bonus stats do not stack

primary.name: Triple Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 290%
primary.desc: Fires three arrows but only hits one enemy

primary.name: Triple Shot
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 28, Damage: 290%
primary.desc: Fires three arrows and Jaguar artillery that pierces and hit multiple enemies but has reduced damage and range

primary.name: Dash 'n Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 225% + (1% x Character Level), Number of Attacks: 2, Chance to Stun: 100%, Stun Duration: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Dash forward dealing damage to multiple enemies and also stuns enemies

primary.name: Dash 'n Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 225% + 1% per level, Number of Attacks: 2, Stun Chance: 100% for 3 sec.\nDebuff Chance when attacking an enemy without Another Bite Debuff: 100%, Bonus Another Bite Debuff Chance: 80%.\nCooldown: 7 sec
primary.desc: Jaguar dashes forward pushing enemies and dealing damage to them. Also stuns and has a chance to apply a stack of 'Another Bite'
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Crossbow Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Crossbow Mastery: +50%, Damage: +10%

primary.name: Soul Arrow: Crossbow
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power +20. Allows you to attack without consuming arrows.
details: Uses the arrow with the highest Attack to calculate your damage

primary.name: Call of the Wild
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 300 sec, Party Attack Power and Magic ATT: +10%\n[Passive Effect: Damage Taken: -15%, Bonus Avoidability: +15%, Max MP: +15%]
primary.desc: Increases %Attack and %Magic Attack
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage Reduction, %Avoidability, and %Max MP

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 40% chance to deal 150% Final Attack damage.
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Jaguar Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Knockback Resistance: +50%

primary.name: Crossbow Acceleration
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, DEX: +20
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages) and grants flat DEX

primary.name: Enduring Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 5
primary.desc: Fires five arrows but only hits one enemy

primary.name: Enduring Fire
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost 40, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 115%, Number of Piercing Attacks: 2, Number of Bullets: 5
primary.desc: Fires five arrows and Jaguar artillery that pierce and hit multiple enemies but has reduced damage and range

primary.name: Sonic Roar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 220% + 1% per level, Number of Attacks: 6.\nDebuff Chance when attacking an enemy without Another Bite Debuff: 100%, Bonus Another Bite Debuff Chance: 40%.\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Jaguar roars creating a shockwave that damages multiple enemies and has a chance to apply a stack of 'Another Bite'
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: White Heat Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1200%
primary.desc: Dash diagonally in the direction of the Arrow Key combined while pushing enemies away

primary.name: Hunting Assistant Unit
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 64, Duration: 31 sec, Attack Duration: 3 sec, Reload time: 4 sec, Number of Enemies: 8, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 3\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Summons a turret that attacks in an area for a certain interval before having to recharge to attack again
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Feline Berserk
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 130. Gives the Jaguar red wings for 300 sec.\n[Passive Effects - Attack Power: +20%, Final Damage: +10%, Movement Speed: +15, Attack Speed: +1, Max HP: +50%]
primary.desc: Skill is a passive, the active effect provides a visual red wing effect

primary.name: Flurry
primary.shortDesc: Dexterity: + 40, Dodge Chance: 40%, all attacks following a successful dodge for 1 sec will be criticals.
primary.desc: Grants a chance to dodge attacks
details: Whenever you dodge an attack, all your attacks will be Critical Hits briefly
Additionally, grants flat DEX

primary.name: Jaguar Link
primary.shortDesc: Each Captured Jaguar - Critical Rate: +3%, Critical Damage: +2%, Max Number of Jaguars: 6, Attack Power: +10
primary.desc: For each captured Jaguar, gain %Crit Chance, %Crit Damage and Attack

primary.name: Backstep
primary.shortDesc: While activated, your Jaguar is able to attack while walking backwards.\n[Passive Effect: Damage Taken: -20%]
primary.desc: While toggled, walk backward without changing directions
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage Reduction

primary.name: Wild Arrow Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 13, Damage per arrow: 370%, Speed during casting: 140, Boss Monster Damage: +10%
primary.desc: Continuously fires arrows but attacks only hits one enemy
details: Deals increased %Damage to bosses
Can move and jump while casting
Prioritizes bosses with highest HP within range first

primary.name: Wild Arrow Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 13, Max Enemies Hit (per shot): 8, Damage: 185%, Number of Piercing Attacks: 2\nGrenade: attacks up to 3 enemies for 655% damage 2 times. Cooldown: 3 sec.
primary.desc: Continuously fires arrows and Jaguar artillery that pierce and hit multiple enemies but has reduced damage and range
details: Can move, jump, and use while casting
If the attack hits an enemy, a grenade will be fired towards enemies that were not initially hit
Right-clicking the skill will change the skill to Wild Arrow Blast Type P that is only usable while mounted

primary.name: Wild Arrow Blast Type P
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8\nDamage Against Normal Monsters: +120%p
primary.desc: Fires an explosive blast forward
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Right-clicking the skill will change the skill back to Wild Arrow Blast

primary.name: Jaguar Soul
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 270% + 1% per character level, Number of Attacks: 12. Stun Chance: 100%, Duration: 10 sec, Stun Duration increased by up to 100% based on damage inflicted by Jaguar Soul\nAnother Bite Debuff Chance: 100%\nCooldown: 210 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a cry that attacks and binds the enemy with the highest HP and applies a stack of 'Another Bite'

primary.name: Drill Salvo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Duration: 15 sec, Damage: 430%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nCooldown: 30 sec\nWild Arrow Blast and Wild Arrow Blast Type P Damage Against Normal Monsters While Mounted on Jaguar: +40%
primary.desc: Summons a turret that launches drill attacks
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases and %Damage against regular monsters while mounted on Jaguar

primary.name: Sharp Eyes
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +15%, Duration: 300 sec

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30\nCooldown: 360 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds

primary.name: Extended Magazine
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +20%, All Stats: +60

primary.name: Crossbow Expert
primary.shortDesc: Crossbow Mastery: +70%. Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +20%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Wild Instinct
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +50%, Ignore Enemy's Weapon DEF: 30%

primary.name: Advanced Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +20 permanently.\n[Final Attack Skills] Final Attack Chance: 70%, Damage: 210%
details: Increases activation chance and %Damage
Now grants flat Attack

primary.name: Natural Force
primary.shortDesc: Elemental Resistance: +30%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +15, Knockback Resistance: +50%

hyperPassive.name: Wild Arrow Blast - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of and

hyperPassive.name: Wild Arrow Blast - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of and

hyperPassive.name: Wild Arrow Blast - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of and

hyperActive.name: Silent Rampage
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Duration: 40 sec, Damage: +40%, Final Attack Chance: 100%.\nCooldown: 120 sec

hyperActive.name: Exploding Arrows
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 11, Max Enemies Hit: 15\nCooldown: 12 sec
hyperActive.desc: Create a large area attack that deals damage to multiple enemies
details: Shares cooldown with Jaguar Rampage

hyperActive.name: Jaguar Rampage
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 500% + 1% per level, Number of Attacks: 9. 100% Chance for Another Bite.\nCooldown: 12 sec
hyperActive.desc: Jaguar dashes forward dealing damage and applying a stack of 'Another Bite'
details: Shares a cooldown with Exploding Arrows
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

hyperActive.name: For Liberty
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Demon, Resistance, and Xenon party members.

fifthMain.name: Jaguar Storm
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, summons 7 jaguars from among the ones you've tamed (excluding your current jaguar) for 40 sec. Applies 87% Final Damage to the skills of summoned jaguars. While this skill is active, using the jaguar skill to attack will cause a 150% damage increase in Damage Against Normal Monsters and 50% increase in the debuff chance for Another Bite.
If the skill is activated with the down arrow key, only 3 jagulars will be summoned but their Final Damage will increase to 205%.
If you activate this skill again while it is active, your jaguars will be re-summoned to your location. Jaguars can be re-summoned once every 6 secs.
Cooldown: 125 sec.
[Passive Effect - ATT Power: +55]
fifthMain.desc: Summons additional Jaguars that you've captured to fight alongside you and can also use Jaguar Attacks
details: [Passive]: Grants flat Attack
Pressing the Down Arrow Key and Skill Key together will instead summon fewer jaguars but their %Final Damage is increased
While active, Jaguar Attacks gain increased %Damage against regular monsters and have a higher chance to apply 'Another Bite'
While the skill is active, pressing the Skill Key will re-summon your jaguars to your location

fifthMain.name: Primal Fury
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Grants invincibility for 10 sec. [Primary Attack] Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 675%, Number of Attacks: 12. Primary attack occurs 9 times. [Final Attack] Activates a shock 4 time sthat unleashes 15 attacks for 900% damage. Shock has Critical Rate +100% and ignores 100% additional enemy Defense.
Final Attack can be triggered immediately by using the skill before the Primary Attacks are complete, and 100% chance for Another Bite debuff to be at max stack.
If not mounted, causes you to mount your jaguar. Invincible while mounting.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a devastating large area attack before dealing a final attack
details:
You are invincible briefly after casting
  • If not mounted when used, you will automatically mount and be invincible while mounting
Final attack is a guaranteed Critical Hit, has 100% Ignore DEF and applies max stacks of 'Another Bite'
While active, pressing the Skill Key again will immediately trigger the final attack

fifthMain.name: Primal Grenade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, upon explosion deals Damage: 1200%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6
No casting action while Wild Arrow Blast and Wild Arrow Blast Type X is active.
1 grenade is prepared every 4.5 sec. Can have up to 8 grenades
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Launches grenades that detonate when it hits an enemy
details: If the grenade does not hit an enemy, it will bounce and detonate after a short delay
When used with or there is no casting action meaning you can continue to move and continue attacking while casting Primal Grenade
1 grenade is prepared every 4.5 secs and you can hold up to 8 grenades at once
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Wild Arrow Blast Type X
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Key Down Duration: 5.0 sec, Frontal Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1105%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 7, Enemy DEF Ignored: 20%\nCooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Fires a continuous barrage of arrows forward
details: You can move while casting
Attack has increased %Ignore DEF

notable.name: Wild Arrow Blast Type P - 4th Job

meta: Wild Hunter is a DEX archer class part of the Resistance. What is unique about Wild Hunter is that she can ride a jaguar into battle and also command it to attack alongside you
